text:
@GrandpaSnarky Bald faced LIE from @NikkiHaley 

Better quality for the wealthy and his sycophants like her.

She Is out of touch and knows nothing of Coronavirus, unemployment, recession, and LOWER quality of life today obviously.

Read a damn newspaper! Learn what the REALITY for the public.
